actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: To amend title 17, United States Code, to create a dispute settlement procedure for bilateral agreements between the United States and other countries with respect to copyrights and mask works, and for other purposes.
short_title: Copyright and Mask Work Dispute Settlement Authority Act of 1990

summary.text: Copyright and Mask Work Dispute Settlement Authority Act of 1990 - Amends Federal copyright law to prescribe dispute settlement procedures in the event of a disagreement between the United States and a foreign country regarding either nation's obligation to accord copyright and mask work protection to works protected by a bilateral agreement between the two nations.

titles.title: Copyright and Mask Work Dispute Settlement Authority Act of 1990

To amend title 17, United States Code, to create a dispute settlement procedure for bilateral agreements between the United States and other countries with respect to copyrights and mask works, and for other purposes.
